= Updating CentOS to CHAOS 5 =

Download and install

http://mirrors.kernel.org/centos/6.2/isos/x86_64/CentOS-6.2-x86_64-minimal.iso

put node on network, if not on the network, this may help. Edit:

/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0

and add:

ONBOOT=yes

BOOTPROTO=dhcp

{{{
/etc/init.d/network restart
yum update
}}}

reboot

{{{
rpm -Uv ftp://gdo-lc.ucllnl.org/pub/projects/chaos/5.0/x86_64/chaos-release.rpm

rpm -Uv ftp://gdo-lc.ucllnl.org/pub/projects/chaos/5.0/x86_64/epel-release.rpm

yum install Chaos.Base

}}}
